title: Lewis and Clark National Historical Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping        Oregon's Fort Stevens State Park offers camping (tent, RV and yurt), beach combing, freshwater lake swimming, trails, wildlife viewing, an historic shipwreck and an historic military area. Washington's Cape Disappointment State Park (formerly Fort Canby State Park) is a 1,882-acre camping (tent & RV) park on the Long Beach Peninsula, fronted by the Pacific Ocean.
